description: This script manages the 'potd' (password of the day) service, including starting, stopping, and responding to system events related to WAN status and link state. It sources external scripts and configuration files, and performs process control and system state checks.

methods.name: service_start
methods.description: Starts the potd service, waits for valid system time, and initiates the password generation if conditions are met.

methods.name: service_stop
methods.description: Stops the potd service and updates system status.
